user_generation.test_3: Based on the given usernames: {user_names}, please generate 3 new usernames that imitate the style and structure of the provided usernames. The output should be in the following format: username1,username2,username3 (all usernames should be comma-separated without spaces).

post_generation.test_1:
Please generate 10 social media posts on the given topic: '{topic}'. Each post should convey the emotion: {emotion}'. Please incorporate Emoji, hashtags, and '@' into the posts randomly, ensuring the posts are a mix of these elements without needing to include all of them in every post. Please do not have links in the posts. Return the posts as a valid JSON structure in the following format:
{{
    "post1": "content for post1",
    "post2": "content for post2",
    "post3": "content for post3",
    ...
}}. Please do not include any numbering or markers. Do not wrap the answer with ```.
post_generation.no_topic:
Please generate 10 social media posts about daily routines like an influencer. Each post should convey the emotion: {emotion}'. Please incorporate Emoji, hashtags, and '@' into the posts randomly, ensuring the posts are a mix of these elements without needing to include all of them in every post. Please do not have links in the posts. Return the posts as a valid JSON structure in the following format:
{{
    "post1": "content for post1",
    "post2": "content for post2",
    "post3": "content for post3",
    ...
}}. Please do not include any numbering or markers. Do not wrap the answer with ```.
